bill.title: Electric Guns; Department of Land and Natural Resources
bill.description: Requires no later than June 30, 2018, that the Conservation and Resources Enforcement Program of the Department of Land and Natural Resources meet law enforcement accreditation or recognition standards of the Commission on Accreditation for Law Enforcement Agencies, Inc. in the use of electric guns. (SD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to PBM, WLO, FIN, referral sheet 8
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by PBM on Thursday, 02-02-12 9:00AM in House conference room 309.

(H) The committees on PBM recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Aquino, Cullen, Ichiyama, M. Lee, Luke, Saiki, Takai, Takumi, Yamashita, Fontaine, Johanson; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Souki; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from PBM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 181-12), recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to WLO.

(H) Passed Second Reading and referred to the committee(s) on WLO with Representative(s) Awana, Wooley voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Belatti voting no (1) and Representative(s) C. Lee excused (1).
(H) Re-referred to PBM, FIN, referral sheet 22
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Thursday, 02-23-12 11:00AM in House conference room 308.
(H) Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: Representative(s) Oshiro, M. Lee, Choy, Cullen, Giugni, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, Kawakami, C. Lee, Morikawa, Tokioka, Yamashita, Marumoto, Riviere, Ward; Ayes with reservations: none; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
(H) Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 743-12) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Third Reading.
(H) Forty-eight (48) hours notice Tuesday, 03-06-12.

(H) Passed Third Reading as amended in HD 1 with Representative(s) Fontaine, C. Lee, Pine, Ward voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Awana, Belatti, Hanohano, Wooley voting no (4) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
(S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 285).
(S) Passed First Reading.
(S) Referred to PGM/WLH.
(S) The committee(s) on PGM/WLH has scheduled a public hearing on 03-29-12 2:45PM in conference room 224.
(S) The committee on WLH deferred the measure.
(S) The committee on PGM deferred the measure.
(S) The committee(s) on PGM/WLH will hold a public decision making on 04-03-12 1:10PM in conference room 225.

(S) The committee(s) on PGM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in PGM were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Espero, Kidani, Baker, Ryan; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.

(S) The committee(s) on WLH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WLH were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Ryan, Shimabukuro, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 3 Excused: Senator(s) Solomon, Fukunaga, Slom.
(S) Reported from PGM/WLH (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 3182) with recommendation of passage on Second Reading, as amended (SD 1) and placement on the calendar for Third Reading.
(S) Report adopted; Passed Second Reading, as amended (SD 1).
(S) 48 Hrs. Notice 04-10-12.
(S) Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 1). Ayes, 25; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Ihara . Noes, 0 (none). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
(H) Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 653) in amended form (SD 1).
(H) House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
(S) Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 547).
(H) Re-referred to PBM, WLO, FIN, referral sheet 65
(H) House conferees appointed: Aquino, Chang, Cullen Co-Chairs; Har, Ito, Fontaine.
(S) Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 612).
(S) Senate Conferees appointed: Espero, Chair; Dela Cruz, Co-Chair(s); Ryan, Slom.
(H) Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 795).
(H) House Conferee(s) discharged.
(S) Received notice of change in conferees (Hse. Com. No. 714).
(H) Reconsideration of action taken on 04-12-12.
(S) Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 717).
(H) House agrees to Senate amendment(s).
(H) Passed Final Reading as amended in SD 1 with none voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Nishimoto excused (1).
(S) Received notice of House agreement and passage on Final Reading (Hse. Com. No. 727).
(H) Transmitted to Governor.
